Others: The Oklahoma City Thunder lost to the Cleveland Cavaliers with a score of 129-122.
The Thunder had 15 turnovers and got 9 steals, but were outrebounded 40-38 by the Cavaliers.
Donovan Mitchell, the Cavs' leading scorer, shot 3-of-16 from the field and scored 11 points.
Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored a game-high 31 points for the Thunder, but went 1-of-6 from 3-point range.
